title: Client download speed starts out well, drops after a short time
body:
After 100 of time later, my client started downloading the game at good speed. Suddenly, the speed drops step by step. Now showing the ETA 1000+ mins! 
If I restart the client, it starts downloading from the beginning. What to do? 
Will it take years to download this game or it is a never-ending process?
Please fix this or give a proper solution! I have paid money to buy RP before! That's why I have to stick with that game! Else I should quit this game.

replies.body:
Thank you! However, I managed! I left my PC for the whole night. And the problem solved.  

I recommend Riot should fix this issue soon because it affects many users!

We don't currently have any way of pausing the patch downloads, so you'll need to let the download finish in one go. If it seems to be moving way slower than it should, do me a favor and try updating your Port Forwarding and DNS settings to get a clearer signal to our servers. If you're not sure how to do that, check out those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know how they work out for you.
